name: nativescript-environments
description: Nativescript plugin for create environments using prefixes and copy only files with some prefix.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run setupdemo && cd ../demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run setupdemo && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.debug.ios: npm run setupdemo && cd ../demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run setupdemo && cd ../demo && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm run setupdemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo-ng.android: npm run setupdemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --emulator
scripts.debug-ng.ios: npm run setupdemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug-ng.android: npm run setupdemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.setup: cd ../demo && npm install && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.setup-ng: cd ../demo-ng && npm install && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
